issue.title: TF data from ignition does not follow REP 105

content.raw: I was able to get the subt\_extended docker image running .  I just had to install one more package in docker \(ros-melodic-move-base\).  The ground vehicle enters the tunnel and goes about 50 feet before turning into the wall and getting stuck.  But, thanks for putting together these packages in the subt\_extended container.  There’s some very helpful stuff in there.
content.html: I was able to get the subt_extended docker image running . I just had to install one more package in docker (ros-melodic-move-base). The ground vehicle enters the tunnel and goes about 50 feet before turning into the wall and getting stuck. But, thanks for putting together these packages in the subt_extended container. There’s some very helpful stuff in there.
